NC.Q: Between the flows from node Training Program to node Good and from node Mentorship Assignment to node Excellent, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Mentorship Assignment} to node {Excellent} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Training Program to node Excellent and from node Training Program to node Good, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Training Program to node Good, from node Mentorship Assignment to node Below Average, and from node Mentorship Assignment to node Good, which path has the largest flow?
